|**Settings**

|**FG-Settings**

|**Known Issues**
a|
* DX11 crashes if FSR2 is enabled - either set `EnableFsr2Inputs=false` in OptiScaler.ini, or run in DX12 mode (recommended)

|**Notes**
a|
* Use DX12

|**Reported By**
|Matze4100, TheRazerMD
